00056 void EGS_BaseSpectrum::reportAverageEnergy() const {
00057     egsInformation("expected average energy: %g\n",expectedAverage());
00058     EGS_Float e=0,de=0; getSampledAverage(e,de);
00059     egsInformation("sampled  average energy: %g +/- %g\n",e,de);
00060 }

00074 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_MonoEnergy : public EGS_BaseSpectrum {
00075 
00076 public:
00077 
00079     EGS_MonoEnergy(EGS_Float energy) : EGS_BaseSpectrum(), E(energy) {
00080         char buf[1024]; sprintf(buf,"monoenergetic %g MeV",E);
00081         type = buf;
00082     };
00083     ~EGS_MonoEnergy() {};
00084     EGS_Float expectedAverage() const { return E; };
00085     EGS_Float maxEnergy() const { return E; };
00086 
00087 protected:
00088 
00089     EGS_Float sample(EGS_RandomGenerator *) { return E; };
00090 
00091     EGS_Float E; 
00092 
00093 };
00094 
00095 static inline EGS_Float getGaussianRN(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) {
00096     static bool have_x = false; static EGS_Float the_x;
00097     if( have_x ) { have_x = false; return the_x; }
00098     EGS_Float r = sqrt(-2*log(1-rndm->getUniform()));
00099     EGS_Float cphi, sphi; rndm->getAzimuth(cphi,sphi);
00100     the_x = r*sphi; have_x = true; return r*cphi;
00101 };
00102 
00119 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_GaussianSpectrum : public EGS_BaseSpectrum {
00120 
00121 public:
00122 
00129     EGS_GaussianSpectrum(EGS_Float mean_energy, EGS_Float Sigma) :
00130         EGS_BaseSpectrum(), Eo(mean_energy), sigma(Sigma) {
00131         if( Eo <= 0 ) egsFatal("EGS_GaussianSpectrum: attempt to construct "
00132              "a spectrum with a negative mean energy (%g)\n",Eo);
00133         if( sigma < 0 ) sigma = -sigma*0.4246609; // i.e. assume
00134              // the user has specified FWHM
00135         char buf[1024];
00136         sprintf(buf,"Gaussian spectrum with Eo = %g and sigma = %g",Eo,sigma);
00137         type = buf;
00138         if( Eo - 5*sigma > 0 ) Emax = Eo + 5*sigma; else Emax = 2*Eo;
00139     };
00140     ~EGS_GaussianSpectrum() {};
00141     EGS_Float expectedAverage() const { return Eo; };
00142     EGS_Float maxEnergy() const { return Emax; };
00143 
00144 protected:
00145 
00146     EGS_Float sample(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) {
00147         EGS_Float E;
00148         do { E = Eo + sigma*getGaussianRN(rndm); } while ( E <= 0 || E > Emax );
00149         return E;
00150     };
00151 
00152     EGS_Float  Eo;    
00153     EGS_Float  sigma; 
00154 
00160     EGS_Float  Emax;
00161 };
00162 
00185 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_DoubleGaussianSpectrum : public EGS_BaseSpectrum {
00186 
00187 public:
00188 
00192     EGS_DoubleGaussianSpectrum(EGS_Float mean_energy, EGS_Float sig_left,
00193             EGS_Float sig_right) : EGS_BaseSpectrum(), Eo(mean_energy),
00194             sleft(sig_left), sright(sig_right) {
00195         if( sleft < 0 ) sleft = -sleft*0.4246609;
00196         if( sright< 0 ) sright= -sright*0.4246609;
00197         Emax = Eo + 4*sright;
00198         if( Eo - 4*sleft < 0 ) egsWarning("EGS_DoubleGaussianSpectrum: "
00199             "for Eo=%g, sigma=%g there will be negative energy sampled\n");
00200         p = sleft/(sleft + sright);
00201         char buf[1024];
00202         sprintf(buf,"Double Gaussian spectrum with Eo = %g sig(left) = %g"
00203                 " and sig(right) = %g",Eo,sleft,sright);
00204         type = buf;
00205     };
00206     ~EGS_DoubleGaussianSpectrum() {};
00207      EGS_Float maxEnergy() const { return Emax; };
00208      EGS_Float expectedAverage() const {
00209          return Eo + sqrt(2/M_PI)*(sright-sleft);
00210      };
00211 
00212 protected:
00213 
00214      EGS_Float Eo;     
00215      EGS_Float Emax;   
00216      EGS_Float sleft;  
00217      EGS_Float sright; 
00218      EGS_Float p;      
00221      EGS_Float sample(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) {
00222          EGS_Float E;
00223          if( rndm->getUniform() < p ) {
00224              do { E = Eo-sleft*fabs(getGaussianRN(rndm)); } while ( E <= 0 );
00225          }
00226          else {
00227              do { E = Eo+sright*fabs(getGaussianRN(rndm)); } while ( E > Emax );
00228          }
00229          return E;
00230      };
00231 
00232 };
00233 
00252 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_UniformSpectrum : public EGS_BaseSpectrum {
00253 
00254 public:
00255 
00257     EGS_UniformSpectrum(EGS_Float emin, EGS_Float emax) : EGS_BaseSpectrum(),
00258         Emin(emin), Emax(emax), de(emax - emin) {
00259         char buf[1024];
00260         sprintf(buf,"Uniform spectrum with Emin = %g Emax = %g",Emin,Emax);
00261         type = buf;
00262     };
00263     ~EGS_UniformSpectrum() {};
00264     EGS_Float maxEnergy() const { return Emax; };
00265     EGS_Float expectedAverage() const { return (Emin+Emax)/2; };
00266 
00267 protected:
00268 
00269     EGS_Float sample(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) {
00270         return Emin + rndm->getUniform()*de;
00271     };
00272 
00273     EGS_Float Emin;  
00274     EGS_Float Emax;  
00275     EGS_Float de;    
00276 };

00330 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_TabulatedSpectrum : public EGS_BaseSpectrum {
00331 
00332 public:
00333 
00348     EGS_TabulatedSpectrum(int N, const EGS_Float *x, const EGS_Float *f,
00349             int Type = 1, const char *fname = 0) : EGS_BaseSpectrum(),
00350             table(new EGS_AliasTable(N,x,f,Type)) { setType(Type,fname); };
00351 
00352     ~EGS_TabulatedSpectrum() { delete table; };
00353     EGS_Float maxEnergy() const { return table->getMaximum(); };
00354     EGS_Float expectedAverage() const {
00355         return table->getAverage();
00356     };
00357 
00358 protected:
00359 
00360     EGS_AliasTable *table; 
00361     void setType(int Type,const char *fname) {
00362         if( Type == 0 ) type = "tabulated line spectrum";
00363         else if( Type == 1 ) type = "tabulated histogram spectrum";
00364         else type = "tabulated spectrum";
00365         if( fname ) { type += " defined in "; type += fname; }
00366         else type += " defined inline";
00367     };
00368 
00369     EGS_Float sample(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) {
00370         return table->sample(rndm);
00371     };
00372 
00373 };
00374 
00375 static char spec_msg1[] = "EGS_BaseSpectrum::createSpectrum:";
00376 
00377 //
00378 // The following function is used to skip potentially present
00379 // commas as separators in spectrum files. With it we can write
00380 //   stream >> input1 >> skipsep >> input2;
00381 // and it will work for white space and for comma separated input.
00382 //
00383 istream &skipsep(istream &in) {
00384     char c;
00385     while(1) {
00386         in.get(c); if( in.eof() || in.fail() || !in.good() ) break;
00387         if( c == ',' ) break;
00388         if( !isspace(c) ) { in.putback(c); break; }
00389     }
00390     return in;
00391 }
00392 
00393 
00394 EGS_BaseSpectrum* EGS_BaseSpectrum::createSpectrum(EGS_Input *input) {
00395     if( !input ) {
00396         egsWarning("%s got null input?\n",spec_msg1);
00397         return 0;
00398     }
00399     EGS_Input *inp = input; bool delete_it = false;
00400     if( !input->isA("spectrum") ) {
00401         inp = input->takeInputItem("spectrum");
00402         if( !inp ) {
00403             egsWarning("%s no 'spectrum' input!\n",spec_msg1); return 0;
00404         }
00405         delete_it = true;
00406     }
00407     string stype; int err = inp->getInput("type",stype);
00408     if( err ) {
00409         egsWarning("%s wrong/missing 'type' input\n",spec_msg1);
00410         if( delete_it ) delete inp; return 0;
00411     }
00412     EGS_BaseSpectrum *spec = 0;
00413     if( inp->compare(stype,"monoenergetic") ) {
00414         EGS_Float Eo; err = inp->getInput("energy",Eo);
00415         if( err ) egsWarning("%s wrong/missing 'energy' input for a "
00416                 "monoenergetic spectrum\n",spec_msg1);
00417         else spec = new EGS_MonoEnergy(Eo);
00418     }
00419     else if( inp->compare(stype,"Gaussian") ) {
00420         EGS_Float Eo, sig, fwhm;
00421         int err1 = inp->getInput("mean energy",Eo);
00422         int err2 = inp->getInput("sigma",sig);
00423         int err3 = inp->getInput("fwhm",fwhm);
00424         if( err1 || (err2 && err3) ) {
00425             if( err1 ) egsWarning("%s wrong/missing 'mean energy' input"
00426                " for a Gaussian spectrum\n",spec_msg1);
00427             else egsWarning("%s wrong/missing 'sigma' and 'FWHM' input for a "
00428                  "Gaussian spectrum\n",spec_msg1);
00429 
00430         } else {
00431             if( Eo <= 0 ) egsWarning("%s mean energy must be positive but your"
00432                   " input was %g\n",Eo);
00433             else {
00434                 if( !err2 ) {
00435                     if( sig <= 0 ) egsWarning("%s sigma must be positive"
00436                          " but your input was %g\n",spec_msg1,sig);
00437                     else spec = new EGS_GaussianSpectrum(Eo,sig);
00438                 }
00439                 else {
00440                     if( fwhm <= 0 )  egsWarning("%s FWHM must be positive"
00441                          " but your input was %g\n",spec_msg1,fwhm);
00442                     else spec = new EGS_GaussianSpectrum(Eo,-fwhm);
00443                 }
00444             }
00445         }
00446     }
00447     else if( inp->compare(stype,"Double Gaussian") ) {
00448         EGS_Float Eo; vector<EGS_Float> sig, fwhm;
00449         int err1 = inp->getInput("mean energy",Eo);
00450         int err2 = inp->getInput("sigma",sig);
00451         int err3 = inp->getInput("fwhm",fwhm);
00452         if( !err1 && Eo <= 0 ) err1 = 1;
00453         if( !err2 && sig.size() != 2 ) err2 = 1;
00454         if( !err2 && (sig[0] <= 0 || sig[1] <= 0) ) err2 = 1;
00455         if( !err3 && fwhm.size() != 2 ) err3 = 1;
00456         if( !err3 && (fwhm[0] <= 0 || fwhm[1] <= 0) ) err3 = 1;
00457         if( err1 || (err2 && err3) ) {
00458             if( err1 ) egsWarning("%s wrong/missing 'mean energy' input"
00459                  " for a Double Gaussian spectrum\n",spec_msg1);
00460             if( err2 && err3 ) egsWarning("%s wrong/missing 'sigma' and 'FWHM'"
00461                  " input for a Double Gaussian spectrum\n",spec_msg1);
00462         } else {
00463             if( !err2 && !err3 ) egsWarning("%s found 'sigma' and 'FWHM' "
00464                  "input, using 'sigma'\n",spec_msg1);
00465             if( !err2 ) spec = new EGS_DoubleGaussianSpectrum(Eo,sig[0],sig[1]);
00466             else spec = new EGS_DoubleGaussianSpectrum(Eo,-fwhm[0],-fwhm[1]);
00467         }
00468     }
00469     else if( inp->compare(stype,"uniform") ) {
00470         vector<EGS_Float> range; EGS_Float Emin, Emax;
00471         int err1 = inp->getInput("range",range);
00472         int err2 = inp->getInput("minimum energy",Emin);
00473         int err3 = inp->getInput("maximum energy",Emax);
00474         if( !err2 && !err3 && Emin > Emax ) {
00475             egsWarning("%s Emin (%g) is greater than Emax (%g)?\n",
00476                     spec_msg1,Emin,Emax);
00477             err2 = 1; err3 = 1;
00478         }
00479         if( err1 && err2 && err3 ) egsWarning("%s wrong/missing 'range' and"
00480              " 'minimum/maximum energy' input\n",spec_msg1);
00481         else {
00482             if( !err2 && !err3 ) spec = new EGS_UniformSpectrum(Emin,Emax);
00483             else {
00484                 if( range[0] < range[1] )
00485                     spec = new EGS_UniformSpectrum(range[0],range[1]);
00486                 else
00487                     spec = new EGS_UniformSpectrum(range[1],range[0]);
00488             }
00489         }
00490     }
00491     else if( inp->compare(stype,"tabulated spectrum") ) {
00492         string spec_file;
00493         err = inp->getInput("spectrum file",spec_file);
00494         if( !err ) {
00495             ifstream sdata(spec_file.c_str());
00496             if( !sdata ) egsWarning("%s failed to open spectrum file %s\n",
00497                     spec_msg1,spec_file.c_str());
00498             else {
00499                 char title[1024];
00500                 sdata.getline(title,1023);
00501                 if( sdata.eof() || sdata.fail() || !sdata.good() ) {
00502                     egsWarning("%s error while reading title of spectrum file"
00503                           "%s\n",spec_msg1,spec_file.c_str());
00504                     if( delete_it ) delete inp; return 0;
00505                 }
00506                 if( sdata.eof() || sdata.fail() || !sdata.good() ) {
00507                     egsWarning("%s error while reading spectrum type and "
00508                           "number of bins in spectrum file %s\n",
00509                           spec_msg1,spec_file.c_str());
00510                     if( delete_it ) delete inp; return 0;
00511                 }
00512                 EGS_Float dum; int nbin, mode;
00513                 sdata >> nbin >> skipsep >> dum >> skipsep >> mode;
00514                 if( sdata.eof() || sdata.fail() || !sdata.good() ) {
00515                     egsWarning("%s error while reading spectrum type and "
00516                           "number of bins in spectrum file %s\n",
00517                           spec_msg1,spec_file.c_str());
00518                     if( delete_it ) delete inp; return 0;
00519                 }
00520                 if( nbin < 2 ) {
00521                     egsWarning("%s nbin in a spectrum must be at least 2\n"
00522                        "  you have %d in the spectrum file %s\n",
00523                       spec_msg1,nbin,spec_file.c_str());
00524                     if( delete_it ) delete inp; return 0;
00525                 }
00526                 if( mode < 0 || mode > 3 ) {
00527                     egsWarning("%s unknown spectrum type %d in spectrum file"
00528                          " %s\n",spec_msg1,mode,spec_file.c_str());
00529                     if( delete_it ) delete inp; return 0;
00530                 }
00531                 EGS_Float *en_array, *f_array; int ibin;
00532                 f_array = new EGS_Float [nbin];
00533                 if( mode == 0 || mode == 1 ) {
00534                     en_array = new EGS_Float [nbin+1];
00535                     en_array[0] = dum; ibin=1;
00536                 }
00537                 else {
00538                     en_array = new EGS_Float [nbin]; ibin=0;
00539                 }
00540                 for(int j=0; j<nbin; j++) {
00541                     sdata >> en_array[ibin++] >> skipsep >> f_array[j];
00542                     if( sdata.eof() || sdata.fail() || !sdata.good() ) {
00543                         egsWarning("%s error on line %d in spectrum file %s\n",
00544                                 spec_msg1,j+2,spec_file.c_str());
00545                         if( delete_it ) delete inp;
00546                         delete [] en_array; delete [] f_array;
00547                         return 0;
00548                     }
00549                     if( mode != 2 && ibin > 1 ) {
00550                         if( en_array[ibin-1] <= en_array[ibin-2] ) {
00551                             egsWarning("%s energies must be in increasing "
00552                                "order.\n   This is not the case for input on "
00553                                "lines %d,%d in spectrum file %s\n",
00554                                spec_msg1,j+2,j+1,spec_file.c_str());
00555                             if( delete_it ) delete inp; return 0;
00556                         }
00557                     }
00558                     if( mode == 0 )
00559                             f_array[j]/=(en_array[ibin-1]-en_array[ibin-2]);
00560                 }
00561                 int itype = 1;
00562                 if( mode == 2 ) itype = 0;
00563                 else if( mode == 3 ) itype = 2;
00564                 int nb = itype == 1 ? nbin+1 : nbin;
00565                 spec = new EGS_TabulatedSpectrum(nb,en_array,f_array,itype,
00566                              spec_file.c_str());
00567                 delete [] en_array; delete [] f_array;
00568             }
00569         }
00570         else {
00571             vector<EGS_Float> eners, probs; int itype=1;
00572             int err1 = inp->getInput("energies",eners);
00573             int err2 = inp->getInput("probabilities",probs);
00574             int err3 = inp->getInput("spectrum type",itype);
00575 
00576             if( err1 || err2 ) {
00577                 if( err1 ) egsWarning("%s wrong/missing 'energies' input\n",
00578                         spec_msg1);
00579                 if( err2 ) egsWarning("%s wrong/missing 'probabilities' "
00580                         "input\n",spec_msg1);
00581             }
00582             else {
00583                 if( itype == 1 && probs.size() != eners.size()-1 )
00584                     egsWarning("%s for spectrum type 1 the number of energies"
00585                        " must be the number of probabilities + 1\n",
00586                        spec_msg1);
00587                 else if( (itype == 0 || itype == 2) &&
00588                         probs.size() != eners.size() )
00589                     egsWarning("%s for spectrum types 0 and 2 the number of "
00590                      "energies must be equal to the number of probabilities\n",
00591                      spec_msg1);
00592                 else {
00593                     int nbin = eners.size();
00594                     int nbin1 = itype == 1 ? nbin-1 : nbin;
00595                     EGS_Float *x = new EGS_Float [nbin],
00596                               *f = new EGS_Float [nbin1];
00597                     int ibin = 0;
00598                     if( itype == 1 ) { ibin = 1; x[0] = eners[0]; }
00599                     egsWarning("type = %d nbin = %d nbin1 = %d\n",itype,
00600                             nbin,nbin1);
00601                     for(int j=0; j<nbin1; j++) {
00602                         x[ibin] = eners[ibin]; f[j] = probs[j]; ibin++;
00603                         egsWarning("%d %d %g\n",j,ibin,x[ibin-1]);
00604                         if( itype != 0 && ibin > 1 ) {
00605                             if( x[ibin-1] <= x[ibin-2] ) {
00606                                 egsWarning("%s energies must be given in "
00607                                    "increasing order\n  This is not the case"
00608                                    " for inputs %d and %d (%g,%g) %d\n",
00609                                    spec_msg1,ibin-2,ibin-1,x[ibin-2],x[ibin-1],
00610                                    j);
00611                                 if( delete_it ) delete inp;
00612                                 delete [] x; delete [] f; return 0;
00613                             }
00614                         }
00615                     }
00616                     spec = new EGS_TabulatedSpectrum(nbin,x,f,itype,0);
00617                     delete [] x; delete [] f;
00618                 }
00619             }
00620         }
00621     }
00622     else egsWarning("%s unknown spectrum type %s\n",spec_msg1,stype.c_str());
00623     if( delete_it ) delete inp;
00624     return spec;
00625 }
